name: Quake: Rubicon Rumble Pack
summary:
Rubicon Rumble Pack is four very large industrial/base maps released in 2014 by Hrimfaxi, ijed and mfx.
Rubicon Rumble Pack includes a start map and introduces some new gameplay elements. This challenging map pack should last an experienced player about two hours of playtime.
